title: Pixel 4xl wont turn on
content:
Hi, 

So my pixel 4xl randomly turned it self off,
At first I was thinking its updating itself but it wont turn back on,
It loads the Google symbol but when it goes down to just the G in the Google symbol it has a loading bar below and wont go any further.
Can anyone help me with this.

Thanks
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
